videos.description: In his return to the court, Alec Burks goes 5-for-8 in the second quarter with 14 points.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Burks erupts for 14 in the 2nd quarter) 2021/5/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: Burks erupts for 14 in the 2nd quarter

videos.description: The Knicks drain six 3-pointers in the fourth quarter and rally past the Spurs for the win.
